text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Interesting. In Japan, China, Taiwan, Vietnam where they wear Mask, the Coronavirus is far far far less. In places where Doctors demand citizens NOT wear mask so that Doctors can wear mask to protect themselves, Coronavirus is in run away mode. Lying to us? Looks like it. @BBC
